review text: Its been more than 24 hours and this is not working at all, no cooling.. Very disappointed..

Lets cut short everything as generally people buying 500+ side by side refrigerators have a very good idea of refrigerators and mostly an upgrade from smaller ones.

Pros-
- Less Noise
- Taking less power than my previous 270 ltr fridge ( I can confirm that because on backup power my MCB was tripping and not with this bigger latest fridge)
- Space is huge because of better and simple design, even the icebox is not fixed, you can place anywhere
- AI mode is supposed to keep the optimum temperature inside and reduce power consumption
- Full covered backside, so no open ugly compressor to be seen
- led light switch on only when doors open, (just like mobile phones), again a power-saving idea
- Nice Sturdy PVC material for inside build and compartments
-
Cons
-Nothing just that the compressor has only 5 years warranty rather than 10 as compared to some other major brands.
but even if the compressor fails after 5 yrs the cost of replacing would be 3-4k which is still a great deal compared to big brands.

And an important point I would like to make and ask is - Is this a rebranded version of 'BPL 564 Frost Free side by side Refrigerator'? as almost everything is the same except the brand logo and back cover. And since I may be the first few to buy on its launch on 29th sep. The reason I said this because in the product video initially It had the same video present in the BPL refrigerator. And now it is replaced with amazonbasics video.

But Yes even if that is the case I am very satisfied with the performance and build quality.

This review is after 10 days of rigorous use. Any surprises I will definitely update this review. Great job Amazon Basics!

Update:

Around a month later there is a problem of water condensation inside refrigerator and less cooling. Raised a complaint but I must agree to some of the service complaints ITS BAD. If the service is so poor in metro cities what about tier 2 cities. One can imagine.

I am still waiting for the issue to be addressed by Amazon basics.
Awsm product

review name: Never ever buy any Amazon basics product
review text:
Do not buy, once again do not buy.
No service, installation team does not respond.
Poor communication, call disconnected by executive.
Amazon chat support says they do not support the installation but other team do.
The other team would never reply you .

Suddenly the return period is already started but the fridge not installed yet.
If you touch the fridge without installation person, you will loss the warranty.

Edit: it's 11th Oct and my fridge is not installed yet. Finally applied for refund.

Amazon team really sucks, now they come up with new installation date and that is 5 days more to wait, just to open the box and plug it.

Don't buy any Amazon basics products, this is a helpful suggestion....

It's a monster!! While I knew the dimensions of the fridge before ordering, when it arrived, it was bigger than what I had imagined. Well, it had to be, it is 564 litres. My previous fridge was about 425 litres and this is definitely an upgrade.

It looks great and seems to be working well. Since it has been just one day, can't comment much on the performance.

Reduced one star because of the installation person & the manual that came with the fridge. The installation person (there actually isn't much to be installed) was not knowledgeable. He did not know the function of the AI button. On being asked, he said that if the button is pressed, the freezer too turns into a refrigerator. So, basically both sides can be used for cooling & there will be no freezer. I found it very strange and the little wisdom that I possess told me that AI is usually Artificial Intelligence. This turned out to be true when I opened the manual.Now the issue is that the manual too has mistakes and the language is poor. I could not understand the function of AI button clearly even after reading the manual.

In short, a good looking machine, which has loads of space and runs silently. Rest of the performance parameters will only be known over a period of time. People who come to install should be better trained and should not misguide customers.

Got it at a huge discount for 32k in great indian sale.
Looks great and working fine.
I call it a pure lucky product as i faced no issues with the working of the fridge.
I mentioned lucky because, after sales service for amazonbasics products is totally worthless.
In case something goes wrong, don't even think of their help.
I was trying to call the tollfree number from past two days for installation as mentioned in description (as it is a fridge, no installation is required).
No one pickedup the call, which got disconnected after waiting for 6min and horrible support from amazon, they are no way related to amazonbasics.

AS OF NOW PRODUCT IS AWESOME FOR THE PRICE I HAVE PAID AND A LITTLE TENSED ABOUT CLAIMING WARRANTY IF SOMETHING GOES WRONG IN FUTURE WITH UNSUPPORTIVE AMAZONBASICS TEAM.

Finally someone from samsung (they mentioned amazon has hired them for installation at my home town) have come after 14 days for installation which is not required though.
They have just explained what's there in the manual and gave some suggestions.

review name: A terrific value for money product
review text: As many aspects of the product are already covered in other reviews, I am keeping it short. One point scarcely described is energy efficiency. Our fridge runs for the whole day 24x7 and is always filled with food. Even with that kind of load in the AI settings, I found that the energy requirement is not more than 60-75 units per month over a 4-month study. The calculation is done by using a plug-in energy meter between the power supply port and the fridge plug. I did this deliberately to test the power efficiency as that aspect is poorly covered in both the product description and reviews. I hope this helps.

review name: Best fridge in this price range, ignore the negative comments
review text:
This is actually BPL side by side sold by Amazon on its name. Thou this has a great design and cooling is phenomenal. It is elegant and modern. Must buy this product, but for smaller homes or flats on higher floors needs to check lift or door size first as the delivery guys will refuse delivery.
Left whole side is freezer and right side is fridge it cant be switched or controlled.
The noise level is almost inaudible
Installation is easy just plug and leave for 6 hrs without putting anything inside with just adjusting trays and baskets.

review name: It consume 8 to 10 unit per day so it is not energy efficient and do not buy
review text:
It is not 4 star freeze. It is consume around 8 to 10 unit per day. Other three star rated freeze of caacity 500 LTR consume 1.5unit per day
So please consider extra electric bill payable every month before buying this product
And I applied for refund within 10 days but Amazon had refused to give refund

review name: Simply great except for energy rating and alarm function not working!
review text:
Beautiful looking 564 litres Fridge for a reasonable price. No doubt. It is worth the money. It is 3 days since I have received the product.
But in the long run only we may know its recurring power consumption cost.
Though there was not much to really install, we waited till the next day for the Technician to do the job. He said that he does not know much about this model fridge since it is a new launch. He was also in the dark about the Energy Star Rating. But he was kind enough to call me today to tell me to watch the video of the product and said that it is mentioned in the video that it is 4 star. Yes, in the video it clearly says but how far it is true, I don't know as it is not mentioned either in the manual nor sticker fixed on the fridge.
He, however, did not know about AI function too but it was clear in the manual. If you set at AI, it will automatically set at - 18°c for Freezer and 5°c (4°c) for Fridge. I tried that and it is working.
The shocker is Alarm. The manual says that if by mistake the doors of the fridge are kept opened for more 2 minutes, it will give alarm and would stop after 10 minutes. I did the test but it was not giving any Alarm! I tried couple of times more but it was not functioning. I called up Amazon care and they too have no clue. So, they have arranged for the Technician to visit our place on 9th Oct, the earliest available date due to pooja holidays, to check for the same as they also say, as per manual, it should give alarm. So, wait for the further update on this.
The Technician did arrive, ofcourse, after lot of follow up which I didn't expect. He also was wondering as to why there was no alarm even after keeping the door open for about 5 minutes. While going closer to close the door, there was a very feeble noice which gives 3 beeps. That's all. To hear that again you have to affix your ear to the door (in which case there is no need for this very, very feeble alarm). 🤔🙃
Hence, one star is reduced because of this, poor service and energy rating not mentioned on the product. Any case we decided to keep as we got it for 39 k with 5 k Amazon cash back. In effect, it costs 34k. That way it was worth the money.

The measurements of the fridge has been removed in their production description above now and wonder why they have removed it! However, I am mentioning it here for your ready reference: Height is 70 inches, Depth is 25.5 inches and width is 36.5 inches.

Otherwise, it is working fine and we had fallen in love with it at the first sight! ☺
—------------—----------—-----------------
Today is 2nd Oct 2021.
The fridge is working fine. The alarm function is feeble but it OK as we are not very concerned about it.
It is really worth, spacious and we simply love it! 🤩
Product good but very poor service from Amazon basic

review name: No installation done even after oneweek
review text: No one will be available for installation,,,no one will be answwring the customer care,,, everyone will be connecting to another but issue wont be solved

review name: Product in Amazing but one star is because of Installation Agent and Process
review text: This is one more best product from Amazon. Amazon I am always happy customer. Few things Amazon needs to be more careful about third party service agents. They are not professionals nor seen product before but visited my home for installation. Product is good.

Update 2: Its been 45 days since i raised complaint, multiple emails, phone calls, chats, and no one from amazon support is interested in helping either get the fridge replaced or repaired. You are just asked to wait 48 hours for a resolution and after days when you call them, again same mechanical '48 hours wait' is what you are asked.

Beware you are just buying an unbranded chinese fridge thinking that amazon brand will help you with the service but the customer support/service from amazon in appliances is really pathetic.

Edit: changing review to one star now. Worst cs experience with Amazon ever, fridge not working properly, booked service, one month now, no repair, amazon says contact their sister company cloudtail, cloudtail after calling and email multiple times says contact Amazon. Customer is left stuck.

1) looks rich but quality is average, the outer door is not scratch proof, even wiping off with cloth can create scratches

2) cools the food inside but not able to keep food fresh, complete condensation and water accumulation inside the fridge

review name: Very upset with the services for own brand product
review text:
Product is nice but service for installation and demo is very bad, after taking product 4 days passed still installer ,demo people not arrived
Better to buy branded product rather then Amazon own product

The product was delivered on time on 1/10/19. It had some scratches on the panel , the same were not noticed at the time of delivery inspection. The installation process was worst. No one turned up to install on scheduled time, neither anyone informed that installation was not possible on scheduled time. I wasted my full day waiting and calling Amazon and Amazon Basics. Nobody responded or accepted responsibility. After repeated calls someone named Ravindra called me informing me at 10.20 pm that it would be installed next day. Again i made myself available to receive someone to install. Still another Day was wasted. Then i received message next day that installation would be processed in 48 hours. One of the worst experience I faced buying Amazon products.
It was finally installed after 9 days after delivery.
The refrigerator heat's up a lot. In 30 minutes both sides were extremely hot like Iron. Skin can burn if you hold for 30 seconds. , Very dangerous if you have small kids at home.

Not at all satisfied with the service. Complete deficiency in service. Amazon needs to compensate for the same.

Most pathetic product ever. And worst after sale services ever. I am being harassed for over a month and no body is even trying to repair it. I am on phone 1 hour daily to reach customer care but they just keep bouncing my calls from one executive to another. They say it's normal for ice to melt in freezer during rainy season. Are you kidding me. My 15 year old LG fridge works much better than this.

Amazon packaging was awesome. Superb refrigerator. Quality is excellent. Love the water dispenser feature. Touch controls are awesome. Most of all it is from amazon itself. So I am hoping amazon would provide good after sale service.
Dislikes:
1) Never received a call from installer even after multiple queries raised from my end. Amazon csr has no clue how to help me.
2) Nothing mentioned about whether I need a stabilizer or not. I am buying one anyway.

I was looking for a bigger capacity as my 300 litre fridge was running out of space and this was the perfect choice for me without a big hole in my pocket.

Manufactured by Hi-Sense and I must say the operation is very silent. You can barely hear any noise coming from the fridge which is in sharp contrast to my 9 year old fridge. Space is excellent, provided you use the freezer portion. Overall very happy with the product. Cooling is great. Temperature can be adjusted, LED light is super bright. Needs a stabilizer, same is mentioned on the fridge.

Alarm function is there if door kept open for long time, I think maybe a couple of mins. Water dispenser is provided as well for people who like to drink cold water right from the fridge. Fridge can be moved very easily as it has 4 wheels but lifting could be a challenge as it is very heavy. Back side is completely closed unlike other brands

Overall it's a great purchase and quality is good too. Hopefully compressor will last long.

review name: Worst service and Product ever purchased on Amazon India
review text: One of the worst piece of equipment bought ever from Amazon other , From the get go it was trouble , The machine stopped working in 4 months , Service engineer never bothers to come before the COVID pandemic they call take the model number and say that we will order a part that might have been faulty if its a faulty part recall the damn product , The part never arrived in Feb and than during COVID lockdown the Amazon team could not be bothered , And hence have been living without a fridge for 3 months , Now again they call up say the same thing that a part is being shipped and they will replace the part , Within a week , Last time they never came for a Month I am not hoping for any better service this time either for a consumer focussed and obsessesd brand selling private label goods with their own branding they have the worst service network no one is bothered , Really pathetic services from Amazon Basics Team.

review name: Please don’t buy , it’s a fake product
review text: Please don’t buy any amazon basic product, I brought the refrigerator for my new home in India, back in May , because of COVID-19 , we did house warming at August 17 , same day we turn on and the refrigerator is not working, multiple times I contact amazon regarding this finally they give some outsourced agency number, they are not answer I really don’t know what to do , I’m settled in USA. Look like I have to through the refrigerator and get new one from some authentic brand at least I get some service. My INR 44000 in water . I wish I would have use for one day

review name: Thumbs up from my side. But this is just a rebranded fridge
review text:
This is just a rebranded version of
BPL 564 L Frost Free Side-by-Side Refrigerator(BRS564H, Silver) https://www.amazon.in/dp/B0747XDSQT/ref=cm_sw_r_cp_apa_i_L8MODb66TR8T5

As far as this product goes, so far, too good.
Bought in the great Indian sale for Rs. 38,999.
Surprisingly got a hefty cashback too.
Sturdy package, big applause for the delivery guys too.
No installation guys came though. I myself assembled the glasses ( I'm just boasting, there's no need for professional assistance)
Using since a week, I'm satisfied to the fullest (till now no issues. I'll update, if anything comes up)
This is a very huge upgrade from a 210ltr.
Very spacious, rapid cooling, easy interface, AI is not much of "AI", just some presets (I think so)
The water dispenser is one plus point on many others.
Video Player is loading.

Never buy anything of amazon brand no service given at all they sell cheap made products this fridge has water issues inside it stops in middle for some time and all items of fridge gets wasted furthermore i asked for watentee claim since 20 days they said 48 hours everytime and give me a nunber for technician same person all the time and that guy whose number amazon gives me says he dosent work for this department i am tired of being harresed i request all the people dnt buy anything provided by amazon brand they are not worth the because they dont provide any service claimed by them while selling prodict

Installation as per requirement and happened smoothly as per schedule, contrary to other reviews. Have been using for a month with no issues at all. The cooling and chilling functions are good. The compressor is very silent and one hardly realises that it is working. The heat generated is also not noticeable/felt. The water dispenser is a great utility. U don’t have to open the fridge every now and then. The capacity of the dispenser is approximately 3.25 litres!!. No complains so far and I have no hesitation in recommending it to others.

review name: Product AmazonBasics 564 L Frost Free Side-by-Side Refrigerator
review text: I bought the AmazonBasics 564 L Frost Free Side-by-Side Refrigerator recently (with 3 years extended One assist plan as well) for my parent in India with lots of confidence but unfortunately I was very disappointed with over all service on the product right from delivery , installation and the product design.I don't recommend as there are better products which has longer warranty and better service support.installation services are bad as the vegetables are frozen, hope they fix or replace the refrigerator.

Quality is excellent..

wheels underneath will help you move the refrigerator easily when it is empty.. once you fill in the stuff, it doesn’t move
only difficulty i encountered was, deep freezer is too large (40% of entire fridge).. i wont be using too many frozen items and you cant even use left side of bottles tray as it is into deep freezer side so i had to use one of the right side stuffs tray for the water bottles

review name: Dislike this 564 ltrs side by side fridge
review text: We complained to the customer care well with in the waranty time. There was no response after waranty period is over they told us to get it repaired outside. Pathatic customer care. We called outside repair after paying ₹4350 we were told that there is technical flaw in this model and suggested us to use this fridge as a coldstorage and buy some other company fridge for kitchen requirements. We are cheated by Amazon company by selling a technical deffect product. The staff made us suffer with their bureaucratic methods during our hundreds of calls to complain them. Every time there was standard reply to wait for 48 hours, 3 days etc but were not able to send a technician to check the defent in the fridge. I think they know very well the defect in this model.

review name: Elegant, sturdy, spacious. 5 stars in all
review text:
My cousin had been pushing us to buy this fridge after he had bought the same and was very pleased with it. But when I saw the reviews there seemedto be a lot of complaints, i realized with installation. But then its a fridge all one needs is to plug it in after 12hrs. Whats there to install??!
So we bought ours without the installation. And what a beauty it is! Very spacious for me cos I upgraded to this from a 250ltr. The cold water dispenser is the best part. My husband and kids are forever using it. Its been a few months now, sturdy and no complaints. Would def recommend it!!
Ps. My electricity consumption has gone but that would have been the case with any bigger fridge

After using it for a month , below are the findings:
water droplets ( like moist) in every container body, inside outlets and on the shell of the eggs. no matter what setting it is in.
Freezer is not convertible.
Vacation mode not available.
Finishing in the top corner of the fridge is not even.. its bit high thus unable to notice in first look.
Water drops from the drinking water outlet tap in the door.

review name: TWO DEFECTIVE FRIDGES IN A ROW!!!
review text:
One day after ordering the product the water compartment started leaking both from the inside and the outside flooding the fridge and my kitchen.

The service from Amazon is an absolute joke. Please do not buy this product, you will not get a technician to fix, or replace it if anything goes wrong. An absolute disgrace. There are thousands of reviews stating the same thing, please don't be another victim like me.

The new fridge was finally installed two weeks later and promptly began to leak one hour later, flooding my kitchen again.

1 Star is for the pathetic service from Amazon Basics.
It is very difficult to get service from Amazon Basics. Amazon customer service denied help by saying that issue with installation belongs to Amzon Basics Customer service. Minimum hold time was more than 20 mins. And even after my call went through they did not visit my place. I ordered the product, it got delivered in time but no one came for installation even after multiple follow-up. And within this time return policy expired. This is the case when the product is new, don't know what will happen after some days if ai need any service.

Regards,
Sad Amazon Customer

Edit 2: over 4 months of usage, no problems, working flawlessly.

Edit: around 45 days of usage, no problem so far. Continues to work noiselessly.

Was delivered on time and installation happened same day. Noiseless operation, perfect cooling so far.

Will update this review if something bad happens, for now, you can trust other reviews saying it's a hell of a product, one of the best out there.

review name: Good appliance but service is poor.
review text: The fridge is overall good...at such a good price ...well ,but the customer service is so poor..even after asking the customer care for installation of the appliance...no person came yet...so I installed the fridge with the help of the manual....they didn't even respond well...so I am afraid if some glitchs may appear in future then how i will manage...as they have provided for some guarantee...but what if they are not going to respond customers well.....hope so the service will improve in coming days.

Good looking and excellent product silently working but We have an issue regarding its installation, there is no installation man available till now .
Now it worked only for 5 days till 22 nd October, since that day the refrigerator is not working, the service technician came to me 3 times but he didn't know about it's mechanism so my problem could not be resolved till date. The Amazon's after sales services is very worst, I had talked to Amazon customer care executive many more times but my problem is not resolved till date, I am very pathetic.

review name: Stylish, Sleek and Spacious Fridge but no BEE STAR Energy Rating label
review text: It's a very good looking stylish fridge with ample space. The sleek design ensure I could fit in my kitchen and bring to 7th floor by lift unlike other brands that are more bulky. I am not aware who is the original manufacturer on which Amazon has done it's branding. The only drawback is there is no BEE Star Rating label on the Amazon Basic Fridge. I believe it is mandatory but Amazon not providing the rating label. Though It's available for other fridge. Difficult to compare energy efficiency vs others.

review name: Bang For The Buck !!! Best 43000 rs. Refrigerator out there, No competition at this Price !!!
review text: More than enough cooling, smart fans, Killer looks and aesthetics. Totally satisfied with product and Delivery !!!! Beware it's 101 Kilograms in total weight so one person just won't be able to open it or move it in any safer way. Must wait for the installation engineer .

As the name suggest it should be defrosting, but as per the Amazon guy it is not. Within 10-11 month it stopped freeze ice, so it must be high on warmth not low which is primer function of a refrigerator.
Service standard are so high that customer service guy wants to talk to you again and again, that is why they don’t act on their promises.
If you have 35-40 thousand and wants to do social service to add bank balance of Amazon then please buy this refrigerator.

Awesome product,having plenty of space, it is more than enough for 5 to 6 members family, The only problem I faced is power adapter fits for 16amp capacity socket only, which I don't have in my house at that time. Delivery is delayed a little bit, however packing is excellent.. I tired calling the customer care service for demo & installation as mentioned in other reviews, after 3 days, they only called and came for demo, meanwhile installation is done by ourself. It is straight forward only, just followed the guidelines. Overall awesome..

Good product by Amazon. I may be one of the first customers to have bought on the launch day itself. Basically this is a re-branded BPL refrigerator, which had very good reviews and that gave me the confidence to buy this. Features are good and very easy to use. Delivery was done after 4 days, to my home at 2nd floor, with a very minor dent. Overall the delivery process was good. Blue dart did a good job here. Installation and demo was done too. I feel its worth the money.
Space is more than adequate for a moderately large family needs. I wish the frozen section to be having a little lesser space because of our needs, hopefully makers will take a note of this and provide different configurations for the frozen section.
After using the fridge for a week, I can say that cooling is really good. Water dispenser is a great feature to have, because you don't have to open the fridge door for water which actually keeps the power bills down. It's huge and silent.
Need to check power bills after a month's use.
Would I recommend this product- Definitely Yes.

Reserved one star for later. Will update the review after a few days of usage.

review name: Don't think, just buy!!! It's worth it
review text: Awesome product & unbelievable price! I came across this product while looking for a regular refrigerator and liked it instantly. It looks very rich and water dispenser feature is very useful which is also easy to fill & clean. Capacity wise this is very convenient and it has an energy efficient mode to save on electricity bill. I found the spacious freezer compartment quite user friendly as now I can put any number of ice trays directly on the shelves.

review name: Definitely recommend buying it. Worth the value.
review text:
After 2 months of usage writing the below review
Initially while picking up the refrigerator to 2 floor, there was few dents happened. And inside a shelf was broken, which we did not exchange, but managed somehow, as not just part, whole refrigerator needs to be replaced. Later that day after installing it, the refrigerator became too much hot when we used for the first time. Gradually after 2 days the refrigerator started working completely normal. Now its been 2 months haven’t faced any issue in it. A happy customer of this product. Would definitely recommend buying this. But please be careful in transit from vehicle to home.

review name: Very Moderately Priced Side by side Refrigerator
review text:
The Refrigerator purchase could be described as a steal. I made use of 12 Months No Cost EMI. My old fridge got spoiled unexpectedly & we had to get it on urgent basis. The last one worked about 10 years. I am little apprehensive about 'This Beauty'. Maybe it would give peace of mind for Considerable time... Who Knows...I went ahead to see how responsive is their Warranty Service... Not Disappointed...
I cannot give a very quick answer to how energy efficient the product is... It is a Silent Performer...Claim to have Artificial Intelligence...I managed to get a Vguard Stabilizer for this big a Refrigerator... Hope it will be our family Chiller & food Saver for a considerable time...

The refrigerator is best value item in its category. The issue is with delivery as the item arrived with a dent. Although it isn't big but it clearly seems it was caused due to poor handling of the item. I chose not to return as what mattered to me was that the refrigerator should work fine. So I did not wait for installation as it was fairly simple. I with the help of my brother and father I was able to set it up and switched it on and set the temp to max freeze and max cooling. I started to get worried as freezer was starting to cool better by each hour but the progress was slow on the refrigerator section. So then I left it for 6 hrs and even after that the cooling was not optimal. But then I did some research and found out that I should give it 24 hrs so I did. And in the morning both the refrigerator as well as freezer were cooling and freezing at their best. So it was all about giving it time. Water dispenser works effortlessly. The modes are simple to understand and operate. After that morning I set the mode to AI and the temp is set to save electricity as well as provide sufficient cooling in both the sections of the fridge. Although I have not yet used the ice cube box but I know it will work fine as well because the freezer does get real cool in no time when switched to super freeze mode. The shelf is glass so gives you premium feeling. The sides and back get warm so would recommend to put the refrigerator in such a place where people especially kids do not get access to sides or back of refrigerator easily. Overall the fir and finish is superb. Only thing that stopped me from giving 5 star is the dent. I didn't want to go through the hassle of return and replacement thus chose to ignore but this could have been avoided easliy with extra care. Rest the refrigerator is best bang for your buck as it has ample storage for a family of 5-7 and has premium looks along with features.

It was a mistake to purchase Amazon basics instead of other brands. From installation service to product performance i realise my mistake. Even in first month it is required to get the technician for poor cooling performance. My suggestion to all who are planning to buy amazon basics pay extra but go with reputable brands and sit assured that it will work for you.

I was little skeptical after reading couple of negative reviews. Basically the negative reviews was only for the installation. Infact this is just a fridge so it just plug and play. I also had the same problem like the installation no body turned up but it was not a problem for me I opened the pask and connected by reading the user's manual. I am very much satisfied. Value for money. It's very spacious and very effective cooling.

review name: Demo & installation service was worse since technician was not experienced & trained enough.
review text:
Product was delivered on the set date

However Installation service was delayed & The technician who came for installation & demo was himself not acquainted with the refrigerator functions & its parts.
He damaged our refrigerator's ice tray as he tried to open it with the screw driver.

Questions asked were not answered appropriately.
Demo was not satisfactory.
Use of AI function was also not demonstrated by the technician.

The technician asked us to read the user manual & use the product.

Installation service was not at all of any use to us

Very pathetic service from amazon basic and amazon .
I waited for 15 days just for the installation and still following up with amazon.
Totally irresponsible people who don’t care about whether the customer product has been installed or not .
Interesting thing was the installation was supposed to happen in MYSORE district but the ticket was assigned to ANDRA PRADESH .

When it comes to amazon customer service it definitely has declined to worth from better.
I think before they hire a agent first skill a agent should have is “ lie to customer face “

My sincere caution if you wanna go for amazon basic product .
1. Forget about the service
2 . Get ready to take lot of wrong commitments from them .

Never ever I will buy anything from amazon basic in my entire life .

review name: Never ever ever ever buy this product.
review text:
Don't buy this product at all...it's a big scam
As product will work fine....but once it shows any sort of problem don't expect an iota of help from amazon customy care team...cos they only care for selling product and nothing abt after sales service.
My fridge started showing frosting issue after 10 mnth of usage...had called and registered complaint for around 20times since May 2021 yet no solution nthing till date...terrible
If u ready to invest around 50 k on a product which may stop wrking then surely go for this product else choose wisely where to spend ur hard-earned money

It looks like one of those bpl side by side... Its a nice fridge and i dont know the unit consumption in real world since i found the product delivering better than expected ... It has a water dispenser which is nice and touch sensor for airflow and temp which is effective .. even with settings at the minimal side the cooling is good , so there is no need to seewhat is does in maximum side
Only down side would be it is not IoT based product so it won't respond with voice command :D...i really dont have any negative for this price point

I got this refrigerator for an effective price of around 35k (incl. 5k cashback). I can see the current rating of the product is out of frustration for the product being not installed and pathetic customer service. I was lucky enough to have the product delivered and installed on the same day.

Though the Team who came to install the product had no idea about the touch controls, they setup the internal shelves very well.

Coming to the refrigerator, this is my first side by side refrigerator. So I don’t know how one is expected to work. The left part of the fridge is a freezer and the right one is a normal fridge. It’s a frost free refrigerator, so no ice forming in the freezer part. Maybe because of this functionality, the freezer part is a bit moist/wet (but not leaking) whenever I checked.

The cooking is absolutely fine. The freezer is freezing everything into ice and the normal refrigerator is doing it’s job. The touch controls are pretty straight forward (ice -> left & wind -> right).

There’s an AI mode to adjust temperatures automatically. All it does is override manual setting to a predefined temperatures. It doesn’t adjust to room temperature.

Finally, it’s from Amazon Basics. We wouldn’t know how this brand’s products work unless we use them because they are offering products at a very low cost which makes one think if this will work and if it does for how long. I went ahead and took the risk. Let’s see! Pros and cons time!

Pros:
1. Value for money (if it continues to work)
2. Solid Material and build
3. Simple controls
4. Efficient cooling
5. Has wheels (which will be locked after installation) for moving.

Cons: (Updated)
1. Huge product. Difficult to carry it up the building. Added a picture for comparison with 260 Ltr normal refrigerator.
2. High ceiling required to unbox this inside home as the box has to be removed by moving it straight up or the whole package has to be bent and then the box can be removed in an angle. This requires at least 4-5 people.
3. Slight chances of finger(s) getting stuck while closing doors. Look out for that!

I’ll update more when I find something out of ordinary.

For any other questions, you have a questions section here or you can reach out to me personally. You can look me up. Would love to help.

The product is decent value for money but the service for warranty claim in the worst i have ever witnessed. QDigi their local vendor in Gurgaon is incompetent and keep cancelling service requests.
This even happens after speaking with customer support. By far the worst post sales service ever.

The refrigerator is excellent but the installation service is extremely poor. No body visited for installation on repeated requests and the customers care team, who is genuinely co operative advised me to call the local technician for installation and the amazon will pay INR 1000 , which will redeemed from the bill. Writing the review after a month of usage. Amazon delivery was very good and the installation was professional. Even though it mentioned within 48 hours, they came on the same day evening.
The fridge is very spacious and the automatic function of temperature control is easy and works very well. the racks can be arranged at various levels which is very useful. The power consumption also doesn't seem to be high. they have suggested to use a stabilizer and i am using the V Guard stabilizer with it. This has a 15 amps plug.
The sides get a little hot but it is manageable. Water dispenser is also good but i dont use much.

review name: Great product, ample space, silently working beast
review text:
Great product, in time delivery and proper installation. Pertty silent working, minimal noise. It's huge, didn't fit in the usual paseesnger elevator. So the delivery personnel arranged more men and had it delivered to my fourth floor house. And yes, a 2 liter bottle actually fits in well in the side rack :)
Installation personnel advised using a stabilizer, though not absolutely essential, but advisable... We set up a VGuard Stabilizer VGSD 100 Supreme available on Amazon

Refrigerator is working fine.. no complaint till date. Do not worry about the delivery and packing. It is safely packed with all precautions. Once the product is delivered .. keep the refrigerator ON for atleast 12-24hrs, and then start storing things.

Only thing which went wrong for me is.. A small knob/bush is missing at the bottom of the door.. which makes sound while the door opens/closes. Anyway's I got compromised on that as I don't want to return the whole product for it.

And regarding service I have no idea of what to do .. if my refridgerator gets a complaint. Let's hope this product give a good service.

It's a very good product and and very stylish. It has water dispenser outside the fridge so you don't have to open the fridge multiple times. It has large space for your need. Cooling is perfect you can control the temperature outside the fridge and also you can use built in AI function.
Overall A superb product by Amazon basics. So, buy it without any hesitation as its price is lower than other brand but it is a durable product.

review name: Terrible customercare:Purchased, facing issues: having second thoughts
review text:
Updating review:
1)Product developed issues within 3 weeks of purchase! Fridge started water leakage near the top right section (close to led lamp). I dont mean more condensation that frost free fridge develops after power cuts, this is actual fully formed water droplets.
2) Loud crackling sounds in the freezer section shortly after the water issue was detected. Similar to electrical wiring sparkling- needs further investigation.

Raised issue with AmazonBasics customer support, will update once inspected.
_________________________________________
Excellent refrigerator with a decent price. Serves the purpose..this review is after using it for six days. Hoping for it's better performance in future.

🔵 First of all stay away from negative comments, I don’t know why people are so useless They can’t even install a simple refrigerator. do we really Need installation guys when we buy a phone, then why for refrigerator.
It is most luxurious refrigerator I have seen.
• Pros :
- Big space refrigerator with stylish look
- inverter technology makes it very silent
- cooling is amazing
- LED screen is beautiful
- water dispenser feature is very useful, and we don’t really need extra water bottles in the refrigerator plus it has child lock

Cons :
I haven’t see any yet

Go for it, it’s amazing product. Also click on my profile and check the recommended products.

review name: Faulty product received, Amazon slyly closed return window
review text:
This is a negative review for the refrigerator and Amazon.in.
Amazon has failed me for the first time in a decade.
I received a faulty product and logged return request. Engineer for supposed to visit on 18th of aug. He didn't and Amazon has closed return window now.
Only the freezer works. Refrigerator is not. And the refrigerator keeps switching on and off on its own, not the compressor but the whole machine.

review name: Product is good but installation ppl are like government workers.
review text: Product is very nice and worthful than the cost. I give 5stars for the fridge but I gave only 4stars as rating just because of the installation persons. There is no proper response from them even don't have communication skills, language problem and high negligence in their work. I don't know where to complain about them so that I decreased the rating.
Video Player is loading.

- Less Noise
- Taking less power than my previous 270 ltr fridge ( I can confirm that because on backup power my MCB was tripping and not with this bigger latest fridge)
- Space is huge because of better and simple design, even the icebox is not fixed, you can place anywhere
- AI mode is supposed to keep the optimum temperature inside and reduce power consumption
- Full covered backside, so no open ugly compressor to be seen.

Don't buy this fridge if you love your hard earned money.

In two years, this fridge broke down twice already. It's a Chinese product so what else can we expect.
We have to call 30 times to get the issue fixed. Every time we called the customer service, they will give us different excuses to not help us.

The refrigirator isnt working since today 30th Dec...kindly give the after sales service contact number for Hyderabad region.
The ref was purchased 2 yrs before

All the parts used are Chinese. Once any part does problem, Cloudtail would say they are not responsible and Amazon would say we are not responsible. My refrigerator is not working for past 2 months, but no one is ready to take responsibility.

review name: Beware of support before you buy
review text: Products from Amazon basics are good but there is no support after sale is concluded. You are likely to waste the money
Dont ever purchase product of amazon basics.They are chinese products of very poor quality.They dont have any offline service centre in India.

Design Likes
1.side by side design - freezer & fridge.
2. Water dispenser
3. Veg & meat boxes

Design areas for improvement
1. Water dispenser mechanism - is flimsy.
2. Water container design - difficult to remove from door rack, to fill up.
3. Provide shallow door rack for egg trays.
Refrigerator started having problem within a year,technician visited and said compressor need to be changed. After 2 weeks no update regarding technician visit or part replacement.
